questions.correct_answer: D. Y descent occurs in rapid ventricular filling phase

questions.text: Brown-Sequard syndrome leads to damage to which of the following?

options.label: A
options.text: Ascending sensory and descending motor pathways in spinal cord

options.label: B
options.text: Descending sensory and ascending motor pathways in spinal cord

options.label: C
options.text: Ascending motor and ascending sensory pathways in spinal cord

options.label: D
options.text: Descending motor and descending sensory pathways in spinal cord

questions.correct_answer: A. Ascending sensory and descending motor pathways in spinal cord

questions.correct_answer: A. Sweating and vasodilation in skin

Dehydration is more severe in infants compared to adults. Which of the following is a true statement about infants?

options.label: A
options.text: Extracellular fluid (ECF) is more than intracellular fluid (ICF)

options.label: B
options.text: Intracellular fluid (ICF) is more than extracellular fluid (ECF)

options.label: C
options.text: Total body water in infants is more than in adults

questions.correct_answer: A. Extracellular fluid (ECF) is more than intracellular fluid (ICF)
